attributes.action: Stop Freeze on Pensioners Tax Allowances
attributes.additional_details:
Halt the  proposal to freeze the special tax allowance for pensioners  for pensioners over 65 , and reinstate the the allowance for those yet to reach 65 .

The pensioners did not create the financial crisis ,deregulation of financial services, and  banks,  and the greed in financial services caused it and they should pay.extra tax..
